flawed_nl_solution:
He read 40 pages from the 500 page book because 500 x 0.8 = <<500*0.8=40>>40
He read 200 pages from the 1000 page book because 1000 x (1/5) = <<1000*(1/5)=200>>200
He has read 240 pages in total.
He needs to read 560 more pages to reach 800 pages because 800 - 240 = <<800-240=560>>560

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 400.0, not 40.0. It appears a zero was dropped from the number.
